variants.Description in input context: Ala to Pro substitution at codon 30 (A30P)

Material used.Description: PC12/TetOn cells were used to study inducible ␣-syn expression.

Readout description.Result Description: No toxicity or aggregation was observed for the variant at high expression levels.

Biological replicates.Description: Experiments were conducted with multiple biological replicates, although the exact number is not specified.

Technical replicates.Description: Technical replicates were not specifically mentioned in the literature.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type ␣-syn was used as a control to compare aggregation and toxicity.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: Statistical analysis methods were not explicitly detailed in the literature.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: No aggregation or toxicity observed at high expression levels.

Material used.Description: MTT assay was used to assess cell viability in PC12/TetOn cells.

Readout description.Result Description: Cell viability was not affected by the variant at high expression levels.

Biological replicates.Description: Experiments were conducted with multiple biological replicates, although the exact number is not specified.

Technical replicates.Description: Technical replicates were not specifically mentioned in the literature.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type ␣-syn was used as a control to compare cell viability.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: Statistical analysis methods were not explicitly detailed in the literature.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Cell viability not reduced by more than 50%.
